thread.title: David Davis: Listen to the people on Brexit
thread.title_full: David Davis: Listen to the people on Brexit

title: David Davis: Listen to the people on Brexit
text:
Media playback is unsupported on your device David Davis: Listen to the people on Brexit 31 January 2017 Last updated at 15:49 GMT 
Brexit Secretary David Davis urged MPs to trust voters' verdict on leaving the EU. 
He told the Commons this wass the "core" of the issue being debated in Parliament as he opened two days of debate on the bill giving the go-ahead for the UK to open two years of talks on leaving the EU. 
The government is determined to honour the result of the referendum, he added.
